location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter reports the recent arrival of Captain Lindsay, of the Madras Horse Artillery, who lately has been employed in Persia under His Royal Highness Abbess [Abbas] Mirza. William Bruce states that Lindsay has departed for the Presidency on board the Kusrovee(written elsewhere as Khosrowieand Kussrovie).
